General.Name: Shanghai Electric Wind Power Group Co. Ltd. A
General.GicIndustry: Independent Power and Renewable Electricity Producers
General.Description: Shanghai Electric Wind Power Group Co., Ltd. designs and manufactures wind turbines, and operates and maintains wind farms in China. Shanghai Electric Wind Power Group Co., Ltd. was founded in 2006 and is based in Shanghai, China. Shanghai Electric Wind Power Group Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of Shanghai Electric Group Co., Ltd.
